attributes.title: Ruffles Potato Chips
attributes.description:
Created on November 19, 2010 by NateFord on Sourcemap.org:

Ingredients from a specific bag of regular Ruffles Potato Chips. Frito Lay buys potatoes from 80 farms across the United States and makes chips at 21 different factories, also all in the U.S. Thius bag was made in Vancouver, WA. Last year, Washington farmers alone produced over 112 million potatoes for Frito Lay.
